function_call.name: classify_risks_PESTLE
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Improper disposal of infectious hospital wastes and wastewater could cause serious risks to public health and the environment.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Transmission routes of sars-cov-2 include droplet, contact, and possibly airborne transmission in specific circumstances and settings.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate representation of covid-19 topics in the kg","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Openkg-covid19 not being updated daily","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Propagation of contagious diseases through knowledge sharing","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Misinformation leading to incorrect treatment and drug development","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prediction of unknown side effects leading to unforeseen health risks","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Manually evaluated data quality and interlinking may lead to errors in the openkg-covid19 data.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Volunteers committing data corrections may introduce incorrect information into the kg.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of blockchain technology for provenance tracking and credit incentive may pose security and privacy risks.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Potential risk of transmitting covid-19 through shared browsing interfaces or search interfaces.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misinformation or outdated information related to covid-19 in the knowledge graphs and search results.","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of overburdening the sparql endpoint and graph database, leading to performance issues and slow response times.","category":"Infrastructure risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High false match rate in schema matching due to similarity measure","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inconsistent naming convention may lead to confusion and misinterpretation","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Low-quality literal information in kgs may affect entity alignment performance","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Limited schema overlaps and entity matches between kgs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Duplicated entities in the encyclopedia kg","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uneven distribution of fact numbers for different properties in openkg-covid19","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Discrepancies in labeling process","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Generalization of results to the entire data set without sufficient confidence","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of domain knowledge in workers from crowdsourcing platforms for managing medical information","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Sampling and labeling process might not represent the entire dataset","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of validation for human labeling","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Lack of central schema for covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Naming issues in schemata leading to interference with matching process","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of advanced methods in knowledge extraction","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction of incorrect triples from medical literature","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Handling and integrating data from multiple sources increases the risk of spreading inaccurate or incomplete information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of virus data in ncbi database for kg construction may increase the risk of accidental release of sensitive information.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Integration of virus, human proteins, antiviral drugs, and diseases data increases the risk of unintentional release of sensitive information.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Extraction of knowledge from multiple sources may introduce inconsistencies and errors in the constructed kg.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or misleading data in the case flow information published by provincial health committees","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Misinformation or incomplete information in the character kg related to combating the epidemic","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or outdated hot event organization in the event kg","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Knowledge extraction and fusion process involving human input may introduce errors and biases into the openkg-covid19.","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate protection and public preventive guidance in the prevention kg may result in the spread of contagious diseases.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inaccurate or incomplete information in the medical and health kgs may lead to misinformed treatment decisions for covid-19.","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited diversity of topics covered in existing covid-19 knowledge graphs","category":"Social risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Quality and accuracy of information in openkg-covid19 is not continuously ensured","category":"Data Privacy and Security risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Low coverage of domain knowledge and sparsity of properties in general-purpose kgs","category":"Economic risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Majority of cord-19 data set contains unstructured data","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"More than 60% of included papers in cord-19 do not mention covid-19 related terms","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of clear understanding of covid-19 knowledge","category":"Technological risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Impact on frontline health care workers","category":"Social risks","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inaccurate representation of filter bed moisture levels","category":"Public health risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Bed water content affecting the removal of formaldehyde and toluene","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Need for further simulations in different climate zones","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Possible presence of microbes in the dbaf root bed.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Moisture generation due to the use of dbaf.","category":"Environmental risks","confidence":"Low"}]}
